ygData.subject: Re: Combine rapier
ygData.msgSnippet: what lev are the elem and do you have to have a magic weapon to hurt them? koden ... From: Mike McGovern  To:
ygData.messageBody:
what lev are the elem and do you have to have a magic weapon to hurt them?

koden
----- Original Message -----
From: Mike McGovern <mcgov@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, May 03, 1999 6:41 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Re: Combine rapier


> From: Mike McGovern <mcgov@...>
>
> "Mark D. Sundquist" wrote:
>
> > From: "Mark D. Sundquist" <mds240@...>
> >
> > Does anyone know if combine rapiers exist?
> > and if so, where to get one? I've looked in oasis and N. Karana
> > without luck.
> >
> > Thanks in advance,
> > Daithi, Ollave of The Soerbaird
> >
>
> They do indeed, though they aren't easy to find. They, along with combine
> spears, and a few other interesting combine weapons, can be found at the
> gypsy camp in the Lavastorm Mountains. I believe I paid 53 plat for one,
> and I've found it more than worth it. The camp can be a little tricky to
> find,
> and the fire elementals in the area seem to have a thing against bards (or
> maybe just me), so travel with a trustworthy party and someone who knows
> the area.
>
> Lohengrin - wandering bard of Fennin Ro
>
>
>

>
